short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: secure wallet interacts with CrossFi and EVM blockchains, enabling seamless transaction of native coins across networks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flex Wallet is a browser extension wallet designed to simplify cryptocurrency management, offering seamless integration with both CrossFi and Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM)-compatible blockchains. It allows users to securely show their Account balance and transaction Activity  , Send Native token to any other Users Wallet.
